Rulings.Edison:
●If this card is face-down during the End Phase, it is not destroyed by its effect.
●If you have multiple “Cyber Archfiends” on the field during the Draw Phase, their effects form a chain.

Rulings.Base: 1. If this card is face-down during the End Phase, it is not destroyed by its effect.\n2. If you have multiple copies of "Cyber Archfiend" on the field during the Draw Phase, their effects form a chain.

PSCT.Base: At the beginning of your Draw Phase, if you have no cards in your hand, draw 1 more card in addition to your normal draw. During your End Phase, if you have 1 or more card(s) in your hand, destroy this card.
